rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {P6003} Do Must have passed 4 (I/W) units in {PGW5201, PGW5202, PGW5203, PGW5204} Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course version {2982, 2984, 2985, 2986, 3462, P6003}

description: Wounds can become non-healing due to factors related to the patient, wound, healthcare professional or resource/treatment availability. This unit explores these complex issues and challenges associated with care of individuals with non-healing wounds. The challenges of integrating pain assessment into an effective management plan are also investigated.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
